name: Import Portal Configuration
description: This task will import portal configuration to Power Platform Environment
author: Arpit
helpMarkDown: This task will import portal configuration to Target Microsoft Dataverse Environment

inputs.name: ApplicationId
inputs.label: Application Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value while doing app registration in Azure AD

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value while doing app registration in Azure AD

inputs.name: TenantId
inputs.label: Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can capture this value from Azure AD

inputs.name: PortalDataFolder
inputs.label: Portal data
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where your portal configuration is stored

inputs.name: IsUsingDeploymentProfile
inputs.label: Use Deployment Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: This setting decide whether you want to use deployment profile for portal deployment

inputs.name: DeploymentProfileName
inputs.label: Deployment Profile Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the name of deployment profile that you want to use to upload portal customization in different environment with different set of properties. You can find the deployment profile name in 'deployment-profiles' folder under portal configuration folder. For Ex: dev.deployment.yml
